content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ what s better than a nice cotton yarn for the summer and fall months crochet layering pieces are essential to have in a wardrobe this easy one piece cardigan has options for short or long wide puff or narrow ribbed sleeves ribbing or no ribbing it s a choose-your-own adventure of crochet this cardigan is crocheted flat and then seamed under the arms and down the sides it has an easy stitch repeat that creates a stylish texture **video tutorial ** https //youtu be/auk0ibthmhm 1 **supplies crochet hook ** furls hook size i 5 5mm & g 4 0mm hooks 2 **notions ** removable stitch markers if needed 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 blocking mats and pins 6 optional **yarn ** wecrochet comfy worsted 7 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 109yds/50g colorway silver sage yardage for short 1050 1200 1350 1475 1550 1650 1800 1925 yds 10 12 13 14 15 16 17 18 skeins yardage for long 1350 1500 1700 1950 2100 2250 2350 2500 yds 13 14 16 18 20 21 22 23 skeins another yarn option is comfy color mist 8 short 6 6 7 7 8 8 9 9 hanks long 7 7 8 9 10 11 11 12 hanks **abbreviations/stitches ** chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet est row repeat - established row repeat flo - front loop only half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet lp s - loop s round- round rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet stsc - stacked single_crochet st s - stitch es ws - wront side **gauge ** 16 sts x 12 row = 4x4 inches in stitch pattern chain in multiples of two and repeat row 2-5 from the back of one piece cardigan for swatch **skill level ** easy beginner **size ** finished garment bust includes 3-4 iches of ease 34 38 40 44 50 54 58 62 notes sizes are written as small medium large 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x there is 3-4 inches of ease in this for this pattern the actual bust measurements are 34 38 40 44 50 54 58 62 chains are not used at the beginning of each row the g-hook will only be used for the ribbed sleeve option the pattern on the blog the free version of this pattern supported by advertisements can be found on my blog at http //www brianakdesigns com/ **let s be friends on social media ** website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2022 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern
